relevant_findings.general: Patient appeared healthy and in no distress.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft and nontender, with no organomegaly.

vital_signs.notable_changes: Weight loss of approximately 3 kg reported.

relevant_findings.general: Patient reported increased frequency of abdominal pain and hematochezia.
relevant_findings.pain: Pain that waxed and waned between 5 and 10 on a scale of 0 to 10.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening of abdominal pain and increase in hematochezia frequency since the initial evaluation.
